body:
Hey guys (Staff), I know you probably get this alot but when are the next staff applications projected to happen?

In my time on the server I've only managed to apply once, so I was wondering when the next opportunity is coming?
Thanks guys.

title: Applications

replies.body: Probably in a few months. Christmas season maybe?
replies.body_tagged: Probably in a few months. Christmas season maybe?

replies.body: Usually it's about every 3 or 4 months. Unless we need staff members before that.
